description: Fix readJsonFile import in validate.service.ts and validate-pll.ts

Verify imports resolve in both files

description: Fix Effect.provide type errors in all validate-*.ts files
steps: Add explicit return type annotation to program: Effect.Effect<void, never, ...>
Or use Effect.asVoid at end of program
Fix in: validate-mll.ts:511, validate-msl.ts:382, validate-nll.ts:281, validate-pll.ts:331, validate-wla.ts:544

description: Fix Effect type errors in validate.service.test.ts
steps: Lines 58, 81, 101, 120: Fix test callback types
Add proper type annotations to Effect.scoped callbacks
Or use Effect.asVoid/Effect.void pattern
